SA20n1388:1240: yathā cittaikāgratā vivardhate tathā tathā kāyaḥ praśrabhyate,
SA20n1388:1242: ityetau dvau dharmāvanyonyaṃ nirvṛtāvanyonyaṃ pratibaddhoyaduta cittaikāgratā,
SA20n1388:1246: peyālaṃ ataścāsya yoginaḥ aśubhāprayogasyāsevanānvayāt bhāvanānvayādbahulīkārānvayāccarato vā,
SA20n1388:1249: yathāpi tatsubhāvitatvādaśubhāyāḥ kāmarāgasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ[na] praskandati |
SA20n1388:1264: vyāpādasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ |
SA20n1388:1268: na nityasukhasattvāya dṛṣṭisahagataṃ sammohanimittaṃ mohaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu |
SA20n1388:1273: ttasaṃjñā, mānaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ |
SA20n1388:1277: na tveva prapañcasaṃjñā vitarkaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ |
SA20n1388:1282: yo lābhī bhavati navākārāyāṃ cittasthitau navamasyākārasya yaduta samāhitatāyāḥ [ | ]
SA20n1388:1292: yathaiva śamathamāsate [te] nocyate śamathaścāsyavipaśyanā cobhe mitrībhūte samayugamvarttete |
SA20n1388:1301: samyak prayogatā caiva navādhārā dvidhā matā |
SA20n1388:1305: āhādikarmikastatprathamakarmika evaṃ vyāpini lakṣaṇe vyavasthāpite ekāgratāyāmā (ā)
SA20n1388:1308: sa tatprathamata ekāgratāṃ prahāṇābhiratiṃ cādhigamiṣyāmīti caturbhirmanaskāraiḥ prayujyate |
SA20n1388:1316: saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyayaṃ cittasantāpano manaskāraḥ |
SA20n1388:1322: yenāyaṃ manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittaṃ samvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvejayitvā (saṃvejya)
SA20n1388:1326: nirvikalpakatāyāmevaṃ sthāpayatyekāgrāṃ smṛtiṃ pravarttayati yenāsya hetunā,
SA20n1388:1330: yena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittena tathādhyātmaṃ saṃśayamiti (saṃśamayati)
SA20n1388:1331: tena punaḥ punarabhīkṣṇaṃ adhiprajñaṃ dharmavipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti |
SA20n1388:1334: katamaḥ kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyevamasya taccittaṃ taptaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1388:1342: vartamāne samavahite saṃmukhībhūte yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1388:1345: abhyatīte kṣaṇe niruddhe vigate vipariṇate yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1388:1359: sa evaṃ ratnānyanusaraṃścittamabhipramodayati lābhā me sulabdhāḥ |
SA20n1388:1364: yasya me sabrahmacāriṇaḥ śīlavanto guṇavantaḥ peśalāḥ |
SA20n1388:1372: lābhā me sulabdhā[ḥ] so[a]haṃ śāstari tathāgate [a]rhati samyaksaṃbuddhe,
SA20n1388:1396: api ca | yadanena pūrvveṇāparamārabdhavīryeṇa viharatā viśeṣādhigamaḥ kṛto bhavati |
SA20n1388:1407: yaduta saṃvegapraharṣābhyāṃ yataścittamevaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣa vimukhaṃ ca |
SA20n1388:1409: abhiṣyandanīyena manaskāreṇa kālena kālamadhyātmaṃ ca pradadhāti |
SA20n1388:1410: yaduta cetaḥśamathena praśrabdhijanakena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinoti |
SA20n1388:1422: karmā [rā]ntevāsinā vā kālena kālaṃ yadā saṃtāpitaṃ ca bhavati |
SA20n1388:1426: karmā[rā]ntevāsī vā tadupamena śilpajñānena karmāntavastunā yatreṣṭā['](ma)
SA20n1388:1428: meva yoginā yadā taccittamabhidhyādimalakaṣāye vimukhībhāvenodvejitaṃ ca bhavati |
SA20n1388:1431: śamathapakṣe vā vipaśyanāpakṣe vā tatra tatra sūpaśliṣṭaṃ ca bhavati |
SA20n1388:1446: sa cetsa yogaprayukta ādikarmiko rāgacarito bhavatyaśubhāvineyaḥ kathaṃ sa pañcānāṃ nimittānāmudgrahaṇāyā [va]bodhyate |
SA20n1388:1472: sarvvaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā caivaṃ cittaṃ saṃvejaya |
SA20n1388:1474: kṛcchra ātmabhāvapratilabdho yatremā evaṃ rūpātmamaśca (rūpā ātmanaśca)
SA20n1388:1482: dṛṣṭivipattirapi yato nidānaṃ sattvā dṛṣṭe ca dharme duḥkhavihāriṇo bhavanti |
SA20n1388:1501: kaṭukamanālāpamalabhyametatsthānaṃ tasmādetatsarvārthamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahāṇaratiratena me bhavitavyamapramattena,
SA20n1388:1502: evaṃ bahulavihāriṇo me apyevāsyānarthasyākriyā syādityevaṃ yoniśaḥ pradadhatsva,
SA20n1388:1529: sa cet punarbhavasi pūrvveṇāparaṃ parīttasyāpi viśeṣādhigame prītirjanayitavyā,
SA20n1388:1537: sa cetpunarlābhī bhavati pūrvveṇāparaṃ paracittasyāpi viśeṣādhigamasya[ | ]
SA20n1388:1538: sa tvaṃ tamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pareṣāṃ ca paripūrṇṇe viśeṣādhigame yaduta tathāgate,
SA20n1388:1555: evaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣavimukhībhūtaḥ śuklapakṣābhimukhībhūtasya yaduta saṃvegābhiṣyandanatayā sarvvaṃ punarasyādīnavanimittamudgṛhṇīṣva yaduta nimittebhyo vipakṣebhyabhyaścopakleśebhyaśca [ |]
SA20n1388:1599: niṣadya tatprathamata ekāgratāyāṃ cittāvikṣepe smṛtyupanibaddhaṃ kuru,
SA20n1388:1602: tatra ca te vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavatu |
SA20n1388:1603: yena vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānena tathā tathā nimittavitarkopakleśeṣu vikṣepañca parijānīṣva,
SA20n1388:1606: tathā tathāvahito bhava yathā te ekāgratopanibaddhā,
SA20n1388:1607: adhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathopanibaddhā sarvvā cittasantatiścittadhārā paurvvāparyeṇa nirnimittā pravarteta |
SA20n1388:1613: yaduta pūrvvadṛṣṭamevamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā evaṃ tadālambanama[nu]smṛtyamanasikāreṇa vibhāvitaṃ |
SA20n1388:1628: pariharttavyamayaṃ ca te utkṣiptāsiko vadhakapuruṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ |
SA20n1388:1629: sa cettvamasmāttailapātrādekabindumapi pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyasi tataste utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣa ucchinnamūlaṃ śiraḥ prapātayiṣyati |
SA20n1388:1630: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ api nu sa puruṣaḥ amanasikṛtvā tailapātramamanasikṛtvā tailapātramamanasikṛtvā utkṣiptāsikaṃ badhakapuruṣaṃ janapadakalyāṇī[ṃ] manasi kuryānmahājanasamājamno, no,
SA20n1388:1633: tatkasya hetostathā hi tena puruṣeṇo[tkṣi]ptāsiko vadhakapuruṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho dṛṣṭaḥ |
SA20n1388:1636: ato me utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣaḥ ucchinnamūlaṃ śiraḥ prapātayiṣyati |
SA20n1388:1639: tadeva tailapātraṃ sarvvacetasā samanvāhṛtya samyageva pariharedevameva bhikṣavaḥ |
SA20n1388:1655: cittasantatiṃ cittadhārāṃ nirmimittāṃ nirvikalpāmupaśāntāṃ vīryabalena nirantarāṃ paurvvāpayeṇa pravarttayati |
SA20n1388:1660: evaṃ śamathamārgaprayuktasya evamupāyaparigṛhītaṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyasahagataṃ sābhirāmaṃ cittaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1388:1662: sa cetpunaranabhyāsamoṣānna ramate sopāyaṃ ca tadālamba tasmānnirvikalpādālambanād vyutthāya savikalpa ālambane smṛtyupanibaddhaṃ kurute |
SA20n1388:1663: yadeva te pūrvvodgṛhītamaśubhanimittaṃ tadeva manasi kuru tatprathamato nimittamātrānusāriṇyā vipaśyanayā yaduta vinīlakamvā,
SA20n1388:1681: yathāvinīlakānāmevaṃ yāvada sthiśaṃkalikānāṃ sarvvamevamadhimuktimanaskāraṃ niśritya bhūtamanaskāramavatara,
SA20n1388:1683: yāvantyetāni vinīlakāni mayādhimuktāni yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā ato[a] pramāṇavarāṇi me pūrvvāntabhārabhya,
SA20n1388:1689: tāḥ sa cetkaścit saṃharet saṃhṛtāśca na vinaśyeyuḥ,
SA20n1388:1691: nāsti sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra teṣāmavakāśaḥ syāt |
SA20n1388:1699: na caitāni vinīlakāni yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā [yā] vipaśyanāprayuktena sakṛdvipaśyitavyā [ni],
SA20n1388:1700: nānyatraikaṃ vinīlakamadhimucya punaścittaṃ śamayitavyaṃ tāvacca tadvinīkamadhimoktavyaḥ (vyaṃ)
SA20n1388:1705: śamayitavyaṃ yathā vinīlakamevaṃ yāvadasthiśaṃkalikaikā evaṃ yāvadapramāṇā anenaiva nayena veditavyā [ḥ] |
SA20n1388:1707: vimoktavyāstataḥ sarvvapaścādapramāṇāni vinīlakānyapramāṇā yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā adhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepeṇa vibhāvayatyanābhāsagatāyāṃ sthāpayati |
SA20n1388:1719: evaṃ ca te śamathavipaśyanāmārge ālokasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayataḥ |
SA20n1388:1720: sa ce dādita eva avispaṣṭodhivimokṣo bhaviṣyatyālambane samya[gā]bhāsaḥ |
SA20n1388:1727: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā vispaṣṭataratāṃ pracurābhāsataratāñca gamiṣyati |
SA20n1388:1733: sūdgṛhītena kālamadhyātmaṃ cittaṃ saṃśayamayankālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinvanti(cinvan)
SA20n1388:1739: , idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmaṃ kāyena kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ yadutātmano[']ntaḥ kāyamārabhya,
SA20n1388:1740: sa tvaṃ punarapi bahirdhā aśubhānimittenodgṛhītena vinīlakaṃ cādhimucyasva,
SA20n1388:1747: sa tvaṃ punarapyātmanaḥ antaḥkāye'śubhatāparibhāvitena cetasāścāśubhatāparibhāvitena cetasā parakāye cāntarbahiścāśubhatāparibhāvitena cetasā[']'tmānaṃ ghri(mri)
SA20n1388:1754: idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ sa [t]tvaṃ,
SA20n1388:1755: punarapi catvāro'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ śrutacintādhipateyena parikalpanimittagrāheṇa triṣu bhāgeṣvadhimucyasva śamathapakṣye,
SA20n1388:1758: yadādhyātmaṃ cittamabhisaṃkṣipasi tatra nirmimittanirvikalpopaśamākārā nirvyāpārānutsukāsaṃkṣobhaniḥparidāha nairvṛtyasukhasaṃjñākārā avikṣepālambanā vedanādayaścatvāro[a]rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ |
SA20n1388:1766: ye caitarhi smṛtisaṃpramoṣāccittakṣepe satyutpadyante nimittavitarkopakleśālambanādhipateyā vedanādayaścatvāro[a]rūpiṇaḥ skandhāsteṣāmā(yā)
SA20n1388:1772: punarapi vipaśyanānimittamudgṛhya sanimitte saṃkalpe manaskāre sthitaḥ |
SA20n1388:1774: vedanādayacatvāro [a]rūpiṇaḥ skandhāsteṣāṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ navanavatāṃ niṣpurāṇatāmanyo[']nyatāṃ pūrvavadadhimucyasva |
SA20n1388:1778: evaṃ hi tvamaśubhāprayogamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā catvāri smṛtyupasthānānyavatīrṇṇo bhaviṣyasi |
SA20n1388:1782: sa tvamevamupasthitayā smṛtyā caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu yaṃ yameva grāmaṃ vā,
SA20n1388:1784: sa tvaṃ tameva grāmaṃ vā, nigamaṃ vā |
SA20n1388:1793: yeṣu ca te viṣayanimitteṣvindriyāṇi prerayitavyāni teṣvanābhogatayā asaṃvṛtānīndriyāṇi bhavantu |
SA20n1388:1806: adharmyā ca te[tvayā] kathā sarvveṇa sarvvaṃ parivarjayitavyā |
SA20n1388:1807: dharmyāmapi te [tvayā] kathā [ṃ]kathayatā na vigṛhya kathā karaṇīyā |
SA20n1388:1809: vigṛhya kathāsaṃrambhānuyogamanuyuktasya puruṣapudgalasya viharataḥ kathābāhulye cittaṃ santiṣṭhate |
SA20n1388:1812: na tvamevaṃcārī tvaritatvaritamanutsṛṣṭenālambanena me [a]dyaśamathavipaśyanāyāṃ yathodgṛhītenaiva nimittena pratanukāritayāvā,
SA20n1388:1817: sa cedyāvadāyurjambūdvīpe sarvveṣāṃ jaṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmabhūttatsarvvamabhisamastaṃ mamaikasyaitarhi syāt |
SA20n1388:1818: so[a]haṃ tāvadapramāṇenāyuṣā pramāṇayogaprayogeṇa ca sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogatayā pratatakārī bhavā[mi] [ | ]
SA20n1388:1820: sa cedyāvadāyurjabūdvīpe manasikāre śamathavipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ na riṃcayaṃ(yan)
SA20n1388:1821: yadutāsyaiva yogaprayogasya mahāphalatāṃ mahānuśaṃsatāṃ ca viditvā prāgevāsmin pari(praṇi)dhatte [ | ]
SA20n1388:1824: evaṃ hi tvaṃ yathānuśiṣṭaḥ pratatakārī vātyantakārī ca |
SA20n1388:1827: mṛdukāṃ kāyapraśrabdhiṃ cittaikāgratāṃ tataścottari vipulā[']laukikalokottarāṃ sampadamārāgayiṣyati(si) |
SA20n1388:1833: tathā maitryavineyādayo[a]pi ānāpānasmṛtiparyavasānāya yathāyogaṃ veditavyāstatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ |
SA20n1388:1836: bahirdhā mitrapakṣādudāsīnapakṣācca nimittamudgṛhya pratirūpaśayanāsanagato hi sukhādhyāśayagatena manaskāreṇa samāhitabhūmikena pūrvvamekaṃ mitramadhimoktavyamekamamitramekamu(ka u)
SA20n1388:1838: , teṣu ca tri[ṣu]pakṣeṣu tulyaṃ hitasukhādhyāśayagatena manaskāreṇopasaṃhāraśca karaṇīyaḥ |
SA20n1388:1850: nirantarā yatra nāstyantaramantato daṇḍakoṭīviṣkambhanamātramapi yathā mitrapakṣeṇaivamamitrodāsīnapakṣeṇa veditavyaṃ |
SA20n1388:1851: sa ca maitrīprayogaṃ ca na jahāti |
SA20n1388:1860: yathā me te [a]pi sukhakāmāḥ duḥkhapratikūlā idamasya bahirdhā kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ [sattvaṃ],
SA20n1388:1862: yathā me ātmanaḥ sukhameṣaṇīyaṃ sattvānāmātmasamatayātmatulyata yā eṣāṃ sattvānāṃ mayābhihitasukhopasaṃhārakaraṇāya itīdamasyādhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ [sattvam] |
SA20n1388:1873: ato [a]pramāṇatarāḥ sattvā ye mamapūrvvāntamārabhya mitrā[']mitrodāsīnapakṣatayā [a]bhyatītā ye mama mitratāṃ gatvā amitratāmupagatā,
SA20n1388:1880: satyāṃ saṃsṛtau saṃsāre yepi ca mayā sattvāḥ pūrvvāntamārabhya tanmaitreṇa cittenānukampitāḥ |
SA20n1388:1881: kiṃ cāpi te [a]bhyatītā apitu tānetarhyanukampe yaduta cittaniṣkāluṣya(kaluṣa)
SA20n1388:1885: , ye, [a]pi ca na bhūtā anāgate [a]dhvani sukhitā bhavantu |
SA20n1388:1886: evaṃ bhūtamanaskārānupratiṣṭhasya maitrīvihāriṇaḥ yaḥ puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ |
SA20n1388:1893: tatredaṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpāda ādikarmikaḥ śrutacintādhipateyena parikalpitaṃ na nimittamudgṛhṇātyanyeṣāṃ sattvānāmajñānaṃ |
SA20n1388:1894: sammoho yeneme pratyakṣamanityaṃ nityato [a]vagacchanti pratyakṣamaśuci śucitaḥ,
SA20n1388:1897: viparyastā ete sattvā viparyāsa hetordṛṣṭe dharme,
SA20n1388:1900: tṛṣitāśca jātimūlakāni karmāṇi kṛtvā evamāyatyāṃ karmakleśahetu [............] kevalaṃ saṃduḥkhamabhinirvvartayantyevaṃ nimittamudgṛhyādhyātmamadhimucyate |
SA20n1388:1901: ayamapi kevalo duḥkhaskandha evameva saṃbhūta iti |
SA20n1388:1902: ye cātmabhāvā nānantā[ḥ] paryantāḥ pūrvvāntamārabhya yeṣāmādireva na prajñāyate |
SA20n1388:1904: eṣāmapi sattvānāmatītānāgatapratyutpannāḥ sarvva evātmabhāvā duḥkhaskandhasaṃgṛhītā evamevābhinirvṛttāḥ |
SA20n1388:1908: yadi na punarātmano vartamānān skandhān pratītyasamutpannān manasikaroti |
SA20n1388:1910: yadā ca punaḥ pareṣāṃ vartamānānskandhān pratītyasamutpannānmanasi karoti |
SA20n1388:1920: tathā mahato [a]gniska ska[ndhasya]bdhau vādityakiraṇasaṃtāpitā bhūrāviṣṭebhyo [vā] sarvvebhyaḥ |
SA20n1388:1921: udārāgnisaṃpratāpitebhyo vā praśrayebhyaśca no bahirdhā vāyuskandhātpūrvvadakṣiṇapaścimottarebhyo vāyubhyo yāvadvāyumaṇḍalebhyaḥ |
SA20n1388:1931: na ca tajjo manaskāraḥ pratyupasthito bhavati |
SA20n1388:1935: evaṃ nimittamudgṛhyāpyeṣāṃ sarvveṣāṃ vijñānānāmasmin kāye cāturmahābhūtike bījaṃ dhāturgotraṃ prakṛtirityadhimucyate |
SA20n1388:1945: yatpunarasya tasmin prayoge śamathavipaśyanābhāvanāyāṃ vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānamidamasya saṃprajanyasya smṛtisamatāyāśca[ | ]
SA20n1388:1947: prasadanīyaṃ ca nimittaṃ sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavatīdamasyābhidhyādaurmanasya vinayasya,
SA20n1388:1956: tasya saiva sūkṣmā cittaikāgratā cittakāyapraśrabdhiścābhivara[ṃ] nī audārikāṃ sūpalakṣyāṃ cittaikāgratāṃ kāyapraśrabdhimāvahati |
SA20n1388:1969: prahāṇaratiriva[da ka]rakleśāpakṣyakāyapraśrabdhyā ca tatpratipakṣikayā sarvvakāyaḥ pūryate |
SA20n1388:1981: tata ūrdhvamayaṃ yogī ādikarmikaḥ samanaskāro bhavati |
SA20n1388:1984: rūpārthānurodhena samāhitabhūmiko manaskāraḥ parīttastaprathamataḥ pratilabdho bhavati |
SA20n1388:2000: niṣaṇṇasya cāsya pratisaṃlayane cittaṃ pratidadhatastvaritatvaritaṃ cittaṃ praśrabhyate ||
SA20n1388:2008: cānugatā bhavatītyevaṃ bhāgīyāni [sa]manaskārasya [ādikarmikasya] liṃgāni nimittānyavadātāni veditavyāni ||
